title: The Business of photography
creator_credit: K Lynch, Sally Lynch and Media West
brief_description: Whether you’re already a working pro or just beginning to think about a career in photography, this video is for you. You’ll meet the art directors and the editors who actually buy pictures and give out the profitable assignments. This video contains three half-hour episodes for easy viewing, the topics include preparing your portfolio, choosing your direction, formats, editing your work, selling your services, how the business works, breaking in, digging deeper, pricing and billing
